summaries.revert: Reverting edit(s) by [[Special:Contributions/{{username}}|{{username}}]] ([[User_talk:{{username}}|talk]]) to rev. {{targetRevisionId}} by {{targetRevisionEditor}}: {{reason}} $t(common:redwarn.signature)

error.wikiConfigBad: The RedWarn wiki-specific configuration for this wiki is invalid. Please contact the RedWarn maintainers for this wiki.
error.wikiConfigBlocked: This wiki does not have a wiki-specific configuration, and attempts at receiving the fallback configuration are being blocked. Please create a configuration for this wiki on the "Project:RedWarn/configuration.json" page before continuing.
error.apiError: An error occurred while contacting the MediaWiki API.
